## customErrorMessage() function

Attach a custom error message if a promise fails. If the promise succeeds, this function does nothing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function customErrorMessage<T>(promise: Promise<T>, message: string): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  promise | Promise&lt;T&gt; | The promise to wait for. |
|  message | string | Custom message to attach to the error; |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```javascript
const page = newPage(config);
await page.goto('https://example.org/');
await customErrorMessage(
    page.waitForSelector('blink'), '<blink> element not found (BUG-123)');
await closePage(page);

```
